attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dear sir,
I on behalf of the British public petition you to nationalise the British engineering industry in order to save the ailing car manufacturing sector, one large company that provides all engineering services would solidify our country in the current recession and make us a world power in engineering again.thankyou

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
